item.title: phobos: Comment 12
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: Tor 0.2.0.32 is going to be the next stable release. We were all set to release, until we ran into one issue on OS X. The code is ready to release and be announced shortly.

item.title: Leaps (not verified): Comment 13
item.dcterms:creator: Leaps (not verified)
item.description:
Hello,

I'm running:

Vidalia 0.0.16
Tor 0.1.2.19
Qt 4.3.2

It's basically just running in the background. Am I protecting myself from anything by having it running or am I not using it properly. I went to the Tor website but the content and getting started is soooo lengthy that I can't get a grasp on if I'm using it correctly.

Any quick reference guides or advice would be greatly appreciated.

L
